name: MangaLoader
short_description:
Downloads Mangas from the sites mangafox.com, mangareader.net, mangastream.com

With official permission of mangafox.com
For the other permissions i am still waiting... so please wait with downloading from this sites until I have the permission!

THIS PROJECT HASN'T BEEN UPDATED FOR QUITE SOME TIME. IF SOMEBODY IS STILL INTERESTED IN IT HE CAN SEND ME A MESSAGE AND I WILL UPDATE THE PROGRAM TO WORK WITH THE NEW VERSIONS OF THE WEBSITES!!!
